description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB managed service identities.

commands.name: az cosmosdb identity assign
commands.summary: Assign SystemAssigned identity for a Azure Cosmos DB database account.
examples: az cosmosdb identity assign --name MyCosmosDBDatabaseAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

az cosmosdb identity assign --name MyCosmosDBDatabaseAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --identities /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-00000000/resourcegroups/MyRG/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/MyID

commands.name: az cosmosdb identity remove
commands.summary: Remove SystemAssigned identity for a Azure Cosmos DB database account.
examples: az cosmosdb identity remove --name MyCosmosDBDatabaseAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

az cosmosdb identity remove --name MyCosmosDBDatabaseAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --identities /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-00000000/resourcegroups/MyRG/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/MyID

commands.name: az cosmosdb identity show
commands.summary: Show the identities for a Azure Cosmos DB database account.
examples: az cosmosdb identity show --name MyCosmosDBDatabaseAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup
